item.title: Media gallery
item.description: Media gallery This is a special gallery were source images are automatically resized on Hugo side to get gallery’s thumbnails. Check frontmatter of this file (i.e. non standatd showimages=true). Instrument view Sample view Job view Projections view Mask editor Fit view
